head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CLARK, WALTER WILLIAM

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CLARK, WALTER WILLIAM

block.p: CLARK-Walter William. On Sept. 16, 2000. Proudly served in the U.S. Army during W.W. II. Beloved husband of the late Margaret (nee Hearn). Loving father of Bill, Barbara Mikolajczak and the late John. Beloved grandfather of Natalie Clark, Jennifer Croce, Barbara Jean Walsh, Charles & Christine Mikolajczak. Dear father-in-law of Karen Clark and Charles Mikolajczak. Visiting on Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM at Joseph G. Duffy Funeral Home, 255 9th St., Brooklyn, NY. A Mass of Christian burial is on Wednesday, 9 A.M., at St. Thomas Aquinas R.C. Church. Interment Calverton National Cemetery.
